content.rendered:
The process of making Frozen Bitter Melon Slices is similar Frozen Bitter Melon Cut , after cutting in half and removing the seeds, pith then the bitter melon will be sliced by machine.

Fresh bitter melon

Fresh bitter melon are cut in haft

Fresh bitter melon are sliced by machine

fresh bitter melon are sliced by machine

Fresh bitter melon slices

Bitter melon slices frozen at a temperature of -40 to -35oC

Frozen bitter melon slices are packing

Frozen bitter melon slices are packed in plastic bag

Frozen bitter melon slices are packed in plastic bag

Frozen bitter melon slices are used to cook Stir-fried Bitter Melon. It is one of the most popular dishes in China and they believed eating bitter melon can help reduce blood sugar, help your liver recover and detox your body.
